0.1.11.text: A remorse timer now prevents you from disconnection from Facebook if you triggered the action by error.
When Friends is updated, a list of new features and bugfixes is now displayed.
It is possible to open photos and albums from news feed.
The pulley menus in news feed page and user page now glow when feeds are loading.
Section separator in friends page are now displayed correctly.
Improved images handling. There should be less freezes.

0.1.12.text: You can now browse pages. It is only an initial support though.
You can now browse groups. It is only an initial support though, you cannot post anything yet.
Notifications can now be marked as read.
Friends won't prompt that it is updated just after showing the welcome dialog.

0.1.13.text: Updated languages for ca, zh_CN, cs, nl_NL, en, fi, fr, de, hu_HU, it_IT, nb_NO, pt_PT, ru and es_ES.

0.5.0.text: You can now access to user profiles.
It is possible to access to events in Friends.
You can now access information of groups.
Time shown are no wrong (one or several hours early depending on timezone)

0.7.0.text: Commenting something is more reliable, and you can navigate through long list of comments.
Many UI fixes, that removes annoying issues.

1.0.0.text: Fixed a bug that changed all comment time to 530 month ago
Fixed portrait inverted bug in photos-related views
